title: Basic AI Assistant
description: A weak AI voice assistant made using Python and Neural Network. Can perform a web search, get information from wiki, open a website. Uses voice to open application, tell date and time, take screenshot.

title: Doorbell Notification using NodeMCU
description: Using existing doorbell system sending notification using NodeMCU. Uses PushOver API to send notification to Phone. Very Cheap and Easy to apply on any existing system.

title: RFID Based Access Control System
description: NodeMCU-powered RFID access control system for secure entry management. Use NodeMCU to create a system that lets only authorized people enter by scanning cards. Can be also used as an Attendance system and store data remotely.

title: Zwitter
description: A Social Media Application using MERN stack. Features: Authentication, Authorization, Create User, Make Post, add Friends. Deployed on Frontend on AWS Amplify and Backend on Linode Linux server.

title: AttendZone
description: An ongoing geo-location based attendance application. Geo-fencing: Admin sets location limit, users mark attendance if inside. Uses Facial and Fingerprint recognition for Authentication.

title: School EPR system
description: An Online ERP website for school. Manages school data: student attendance, grades, fees; tracks teacher information. Developed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript for the front end, and PHP for the backend.

title: Online PvP Rock Paper Scissors
description: Online PvP Rock Paper Scissors game with animated visuals using Pygame. Players can create private rooms and join existing rooms for exclusive multiplayer sessions. Real-time gaming interactions through the dynamic Pygame platform.

title: Marksheet Generator
description: A Student Marksheet Generation system built using Java applet. Java applet-based tool that generates student marksheets, computes grace marks for borderline passing, and assigns grades. Automates grade calculation for failing marks.

title: Delight Cafe
description: A Café billing system built using Java applet. Automates bill generation for orders at the café. Utilizes Java applet for user-friendly interface and efficient billing process.
